div.p: This code system http://smart.who.int/pcmt/CodeSystem/tradeProductRelationship defines the following codes:

tr.td: This relationship is used to represent some packaging packgaing, assemblage of kits or other physical containment of trade products. The TradeProduct contains the associated TradeProducts that are referenced
This relationship is a speciialization of the #package-contains concept which represents that the trade product is a vial
This relationship is a speciialization of the #package-contains concept which represents that the trade product is an inner pack
This relationship is a speciialization of the #package-contains concept which represents that the trade product is a case
This relationship is a speciialization of the #package-contains concept which represents that the trade product is a pallet
This relationship indicates tha trade product is equivalent to the referenced trade product, for example such as with duplicate entries in a catalogue for the same phtsical item.

display.value: This relationship is used to represent some packaging packgaing, assemblage of kits or other physical containment of trade products. The TradeProduct contains the associated TradeProducts that are referenced
This relationship is a speciialization of the #package-contains concept which represents that the trade product is a vial
This relationship is a speciialization of the #package-contains concept which represents that the trade product is an inner pack
This relationship is a speciialization of the #package-contains concept which represents that the trade product is a case
This relationship is a speciialization of the #package-contains concept which represents that the trade product is a pallet
This relationship indicates tha trade product is equivalent to the referenced trade product, for example such as with duplicate entries in a catalogue for the same phtsical item.
